text:
Hi, rOpenSci next Community Call - _Mentoring & training program for Scientific Open Source Champions_ is *Monday, October 24th, 11:00 PDT (18:00 UTC)* with Santosh (Senior Software Engineer at Celonis, He is a GDE for Angular, GitHub Star, and an Auth0 Ambassador), Emanuele Bartolesi (Microsoft MVP in the Developer Technologies and GitHub Star), moderated by our Community Manager, Yanina Bellini Saibene.

Details: <https://ropensci.org/commcalls/oct2022-champions/>
Tweet to share: <https://twitter.com/rOpenSci/status/1582338711211343872?s=20&t=qNP44mKdNG9jdWOy-9Jc2Q>

attachments.fallback: Mentoring & training program for Scientific Open Source Champions · Community Call
attachments.text: Details about the Champions Program + tips for submitting your application + the experience of being a champion in other open source communities
